notes: Total is calculated as sum of positive and negative tests.
Total includes all individuals that meet the national persons under investigation definition as well as some others self-monitoring or self-isolating. This may not reflect all individuals tested.

There have been changes in testing unit over time. Between March 15-30 total patients approved for testing (persons) is reported, from March 31- April 14 total patients tested (persons) is reported, and from April 15 tests completed (not persons) is reported.
Total is calcuated as sum of confirmed cases and negative results.
Total is calculated as sum of people tested positive and negative. Cases confirmed by epidemiological link are excluded.

definition: Number of Patients with Tests Ordered
notes: March 15-24 total tests completed (not persons) is reported, from March 25 people tested (persons) is reported.
